theStarKnight:BronzeMirrorEvent.NAME: A Bronze Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Lead by the sounds of merriment and laughter you weave through the stone halls until you find yourself in front of a polished bronze archway. The laughter has faded but a hideous silhouette looms before you.
You reach out and touch the cold and unyielding surface of polished bronze. You recoil and stumble away in horror.
You claw at the helm until ichor streams forth. You cannot free yourself, but the experience has left you more determined than ever.
You turn away from the distracting shade and continue your climb.
OPTIONS: [Remove your helm] Lose 16 HP. Gain 8 Max HP.

theStarKnight:TwistedGalleryEvent.NAME: A Twisted Gallery
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself in an art gallery of some sort. The twisted forms are as enthralling as they are grotesque.
You take a moment to rest.
You pilfer all that you can carry.
